spec_data.Name: perl-Kwiki-Users-Remote
spec_data.Description:
When using HTTP authentication for your Kwiki, use this module to
automatically set the user's name from the username they logged in with.
This name will appear in any Recent Changes listing.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:43:18 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Automatically set Kwiki user name from HTTP authentication
